description: Vanessa looks like she walked off the pages of Sweet Valley High right into her sorority hazing. She's scared, cold and all alone at a creepy cemetery on Halloween night. She must walk through the cemetery and take a picture of herself in the tomb in order to pledge. Vanessa may look like a gingerbread sweet girl but her mama didn't raise a fool. When a crashing sound leads to a mechanical hum, Vanessa is curious more than scared and her adventure in coffin fucking begins.
title: Triple Dog Sorority Dare: Walk the Cemetery on Halloween
